languages.text: "Я приложил{mf||а} все усилия, чтобы каждое зерно ереси было вычищено. Мир Кьява Гамма более не запятнан, ручаюсь в этом".

traits.locale_text: "Уверяю, вся колония была очищена надлежащим образом".

languages.text: "I made every effort and saw to it that every seed of heresy was exterminated. The world of Kiava Gamma is tainted no more, I can vouch for that."
languages.original_text: "Я приложил{mf||а} все усилия, чтобы каждое зерно ереси было вычищено. Мир Кьява Гамма более не запятнан, ручаюсь в этом".

traits.locale_text: "I will make every effort and see to it that every seed of heresy is exterminated. We have no right to give ground."
"I will make every effort and see to it that every seed of heresy is exterminated. We have no right to give ground."
"I will make every effort and see to it that every seed of heresy is exterminated. We have no right to give ground."
"I will make every effort and see to it that every seed of heresy is exterminated. We have no right to give ground."
"I made every effort and saw to it that every seed of heresy was exterminated. The world of Kiava Gamma is tainted no more, I can vouch for that."
"I made every effort and saw to it that every seed of heresy was exterminated. The world of Kiava Gamma is tainted no more, I can vouch for that."

languages.text: 「私は異端の種が絶滅するよう全力を尽くし、取り計らった。キアヴァ・ガンマの星はもう汚染されていない、保証しよう」
languages.original_text: "I made every effort and saw to it that every seed of heresy was exterminated. The world of Kiava Gamma is tainted no more, I can vouch for that."

traits.locale_text: 「私は異端の種が絶滅するよう全力を尽くし、取り計らった。キアヴァ・ガンマの星はもう汚染されていない、保証しよう」

languages.text: “我已尽一切努力，铲除所有异端邪说的种子。基亚瓦伽马星绝不会再次被污染，我向你保证。”
languages.original_text: "I made every effort and saw to it that every seed of heresy was exterminated. The world of Kiava Gamma is tainted no more, I can vouch for that."

traits.locale_text: “我已尽一切努力，铲除所有异端邪说的种子。基亚瓦伽马星绝不会再次被污染，我向你保证。”

languages.text: «Hice todo lo necesario para exterminar completamente la herejía. El mundo de Kiava Gamma ya no está mancillado, puedo garantizarlo».
languages.original_text: "I made every effort and saw to it that every seed of heresy was exterminated. The world of Kiava Gamma is tainted no more, I can vouch for that."

traits.locale_text: «Hice todo lo necesario para exterminar completamente la herejía. El mundo de Kiava Gamma ya no está mancillado, puedo garantizarlo».

languages.text: « J'ai fait tout ce qui était en mon pouvoir pour exterminer toute trace d'hérésie. Le monde de Kiava Gamma n'est plus corrompu, je m'en porte {mf|garant|garante}. »
languages.original_text: "I made every effort and saw to it that every seed of heresy was exterminated. The world of Kiava Gamma is tainted no more, I can vouch for that."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai fait tout ce qui était en mon pouvoir pour exterminer toute trace d'hérésie. Le monde de Kiava Gamma n'est plus corrompu, je m'en porte {mf|garant|garante}. »

languages.text: "Ich habe alles dafür getan, dass jede Saat der Ketzerei ausgelöscht wurde. Die Welt von Kiava Gamma ist nicht mehr befleckt, dafür kann ich bürgen."
languages.original_text: "I made every effort and saw to it that every seed of heresy was exterminated. The world of Kiava Gamma is tainted no more, I can vouch for that."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe alles dafür getan, dass jede Saat der Ketzerei ausgelöscht wurde. Die Welt von Kiava Gamma ist nicht mehr befleckt, dafür kann ich bürgen."

languages.text: "Kâfirliğin her türlü tohumunun yok edilmesini sağlamak adına yapılabilecek her şeyi yaptım. Kiava Gama dünyası artık kirlenmiş değil. Şahsen kefil olabilirim."
languages.original_text: "I made every effort and saw to it that every seed of heresy was exterminated. The world of Kiava Gamma is tainted no more, I can vouch for that."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirliğin her türlü tohumunun yok edilmesini sağlamak adına yapılabilecek her şeyi yaptım. Kiava Gama dünyası artık kirlenmiş değil. Şahsen kefil olabilirim."
